Key Match Events: Reece Topley took 4 wickets for 43 runs
Pre-Game Insights: England opt for the extra pace option with Reece Topley's lurching left-arm seam replacing Moeen Ali
For Bangladesh, we expect an unchanged XI given the ease with which they bested Afghanistan on this stage
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match comments provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dharamsala, under the watchful gaze of the Himalayas
Others: England move on to Delhi where they will face Afghanistan on Sunday. For Bangladesh, they are back in action on Friday in Chennai against New Zealand
